fields.name: AllowLeadingAndTrailingSpacesAndZeroes
fields.description: The value indicating whether to allow leading and trailing spaces and zeroes.

fields.name: CheckDuplicateGroupControlNumber
fields.description: The value indicating whether to check for duplicate group control number.

fields.name: CheckDuplicateInterchangeControlNumber
fields.description: The value indicating whether to check for duplicate interchange control number.

fields.name: CheckDuplicateTransactionSetControlNumber
fields.description: The value indicating whether to check for duplicate transaction set control number.

fields.name: InterchangeControlNumberValidityDays
fields.description: The validity period of interchange control number.

fields.name: TrimLeadingAndTrailingSpacesAndZeroes
fields.description: The value indicating whether to trim leading and trailing spaces and zeroes.

fields.name: ValidateCharacterSet
fields.description: The value indicating whether to validate character set in the message.

fields.name: ValidateEDITypes
fields.description: The value indicating whether to Whether to validate EDI types.

fields.name: ValidateXSDTypes
fields.description: The value indicating whether to Whether to validate XSD types.
